name: antssstbids
label: antssstbids: ANTs multivariate template construction for BIDS data
description: Uses antsMultivariateTemplateConstruction.sh to create single subject templates for longitudinal data organized according to the BIDS specification
author: Ellyn Butler

out_prefix.description: A prefix that is prepended to all output files.

modality.description: The BIDS suffix that indicates that data type from which the SST will be made. CURRENTLY ONLY CONFIGURED FOR ONE DATA TYPE ACROSS MULTIPLE SESSIONS. [default='T1w']

rigid_body.description: Do rigid-body registration of inputs before creating template. Useful when you do not have an initial template

ignore.description: Ignore selected aspects of the input dataset to disable corresponding parts of the workflow. Possible choices: fieldmaps [default='']

save_intermediate_work.description: Zip and save working directory with intermediate files. [default=false]

save_partial_outputs.description: Zip and save output directory contents on an algorithm failure. [default=false]

skip_bids_validation.description: Don't check that the input data is BIDS-compliant. [default=false]

skull_strip_fixed_seed.description: do not use a random seed for skull-stripping - will ensure run-to-run replicability when used with â€“omp-nthreads 1 [ default = false ]

skull_strip_template.description: Possible choices: OASIS, NKI. select ANTs skull-stripping template (default: OASIS))

template.description: Volume template space (default: MNI152NLin2009cAsym). This is currently the only choice.

use_all_sessions.description: Use all sessions in this project for this subject
